title: Decedents
context: ยง235-59 Decedents. In respect of a decedent, the determination of the income of the taxable period in which falls the date of the decedent&rsquo;s death, and the determination of the income of the estate and of the persons who acquire rights from the decedent or by reason of the decedent&rsquo;s death, shall be governed by the Internal Revenue Code. [L Sp 1957, c 1, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง121-14; HRS ยง235-59; gen ch 1985]
